programme.title: Gridiron Gang

programme.title: Jumanji

programme.title: Taxi Driver

programme.title: The Social Network

programme.title: Sisu

programme.title: The Pope's Exorcist

programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises

programme.title: Monster Hunter

programme.title: Wrath Of The Titans
programme.desc: Perseus, a demigod, has to rescue his father, Zeus, who is held captive by Ares and Hades. However, he has to defeat not only his brother and uncle but also the Titans with whom they have partnered.

programme.title: The Mask Of Zorro

programme.title: Ace Ventura: Pet Detective

programme.title: You Don't Mess with the Zohan

programme.title: It Chapter Two

programme.title: Baby Driver

programme.title: Aquaman

programme.title: Spider-Man: Across The Spider-Verse

programme.title: Terminator 3: Rise Of The Machines

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: The Perron family moves into a farmhouse where they experience paranormal phenomena. They consult demonologists, Ed and Lorraine Warren, to help them get rid of the evil entity haunting them.

programme.title: Sniper 2
programme.desc: A Marine sniper is forced to team up with a convict on death-row to take out a rogue general as he is committing various inhumane acts on a certain ethnic group.

programme.title: Peninsula
programme.desc: A former soldier along with his teammates sets out on a mission to battle hordes of post-apocalyptic zombies in the Korean peninsula wastelands.

programme.title: Hotel Mumbai

programme.title: Stealth

programme.title: Bingo

programme.title: Identity

programme.title: Hadh Kar Di Aapne
programme.desc: Raju, a sloppy PI, goes to Europe to investigate a divorce case and falls in love with Anjali, who is covertly impersonating her friend. Raju’s personal and professional lives collide when he thinks that Anjali is the one whom he is investigating.

programme.title: Hello Brother
programme.desc: Vishal, a policeman, gets shot by a business tycoon Khanna. His life is saved via a heart transplant. Upon his recovery, he finds himself working with the spirit of his donor, Hero, to investigate Khanna's drug racket and seek revenge.

programme.title: Phati Padi Hai Yaar
programme.desc: Subjected to repeated rejection and failure, an aspiring actor takes to drinking and womanising to divert his mind. His life collapses further when he finds out that he has caught STD. Will he find the will to live or simply take an easy way out?

programme.title: Hadh Kar Di Aapne
programme.desc: Raju, a sloppy PI, goes to Europe to investigate a divorce case and falls in love with Anjali, who is covertly impersonating her friend. Raju’s personal and professional lives collide when he thinks that Anjali is the one whom he is investigating.

programme.title: Bhootwali Love Story
programme.desc: An outspoken and friendly ghost of a woman is in love with a man named Kishore Kumar. Problem arises when she tries to express her feelings and ends up scaring the man more than winning him over. Can a ghost and a human even fall in love?

programme.title: Firaaq
programme.desc: Inspired from the 2002 violence in Gujarat, this drama follows the lives of different people directly or indirectly affected by the riots, from a compassionate woman in an orthodox Gujarati family living with a stone-hearted husband, an urban cross-culture couple with a Hindu wife and a Muslim husband, a poor Muslim couple whose house is charred to ashes during the riots to an old Muslim singer. As their stories unfold and intertwine, we see the harrowing picture of the repercussions of violence in society.

programme.title: Jab Pyaar Kisise Hota Hai
programme.desc: A philanderer falls in love with a girl who agrees to accept his marriage proposal if he renounces his reckless lifestyle within six months. While he tries hard to accomplish the goal, a young boy ends up at his doorsteps claiming to be his son.

programme.title: Kaagaz Ke Fools
programme.desc: Post a terrible argument with his nagging wife, Purushottam Tripathi quits his job and leaves his home. He finds himself in a shady place where he meets a call girl named Rubina. Meeting Rubina changes his life forever.

programme.title: Chal Mere Bhai
programme.desc: A standoffish businessman grieving the death of his girlfriend, falls in love with a vivacious girl working in his office, unaware of the fact that his younger brother is deeply in love with her too.

programme.title: Nakshatra
programme.desc: Ajay a writer shares his script with four producers. Around the same time, a robbery takes place. Ajay is accused of the robbery as the plot of the robbery in his script matches the actual robbery that took place. How will Ajay prove his innocence?

programme.title: Guddu Ki Gun
programme.desc: A washing powder salesman, Guddu, finds himself in a quandary when his girlfriend's grandfather casts a spell on him after he ditches her. Guddu must now find true love and stay loyal to her in order to get rid of the curse.

programme.title: Chal Mere Bhai
programme.desc: A standoffish businessman grieving the death of his girlfriend, falls in love with a vivacious girl working in his office, unaware of the fact that his younger brother is deeply in love with her too.

programme.title: Husn Aur Talwar
programme.desc: Sapna lands in Mumbai to earn fame as an actress. As she tries to get work in the Hindi film industry, she is asked for sexual favours. Unable to find another option, she falls into the trap of wrong people which includes a well-known star Aman. One day, Sapna discovers that she's suffering from a deadly disease and faces the biggest challenge of her life.

programme.title: Bach Ke Zara
programme.desc: A group of students on a vacation get trapped in a deserted house of an archaeologist who possesses some unusual powers.

programme.title: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: During the British Raj, upon witnessing the atrocities of the British, Bhagat Singh grows up to be a fierce freedom fighter. His publicised ideas of revolution bring him to as much popularity as Mahatma Gandhi amongst Indians.

programme.title: Ekkees Tareekh Shubh Muhurat
programme.desc: A 55-year-old aspiring storyteller wanting to escape his family legacy of becoming a priest. His dream comes true in an unexpected way, when he is jailed and he finds an audience amongst the prisoners.

Why is "bhabhi" one of Indias most searched porn keywords and what’s behind the popularity of shows like "Bhabhi ji Ghar par Hai"? The answer goes further back in time than youd imagine.

programme.title: Official Bhootiyagiri Season 3 Episode 3

Dilawar along with his team make up stories and fake ghosts to scare the guests and give them the thriller. All goes well until something unplanned starts happening. People start seeing things that Dilawar did not stage, and this sets him out to find the real culprit behind this. However, as he tries to unravel the truth, some other ugly truths unveil and come staring at him at his face. Now Dilawar knows who sent him to jail. What will he do next? programme.desc: Once the hotel gets rebranded, it starts attracting tourists and youngsters who love spooky and eerie places. Dilawar along with his team make up stories and fake ghosts to scare the guests and give them the thriller. All goes well until something unplanned starts happening. People start seeing things that Dilawar did not stage, and this sets him out to find the real culprit behind this. programme.title: Banphool
programme.desc: Haria and Gulabi, who are in love, plan to get married to each other, much to the chagrin of Ajay. However, things take a turn when Ajay plans to get Haria killed.

programme.title: Betaab
programme.desc: When Sunny meets his childhood friend Roma, cupid strikes. But Roma's father disapproves of their union and decides to separate them.

programme.title: Do Premee
programme.desc: Young Chetan Prakash and beautiful Payal are in love and would like to marry each other. Their respective fathers, Daulatram and Retired Col. Bhagwant Singh, have other plans and want them to marry the spouses of their choice. So Chetan and Payal decide to elope, and marry on the run.

programme.title: Ek Chitthi Pyar Bhari
programme.desc: A doctor puts out a job posting to recruit a nurse for his clinics in rural India. Unaware of a candidate's dark past, he hires her and eventually falls in love with her.

programme.title: Ek Nazar
programme.desc: Akash, the son of a lawyer, falls in love with a courtesan, Shabnam, when he hears her recite one of his poems. However, a series of obstacles and a mysterious murder threatens to break them apart.

programme.title: Hum Hain Rahi Pyar Ke
programme.desc: Rahul looks after his spoilt nephews, Sunny and Vicky, and niece, Munni. When they go to a funfair, they meet Vyjayanti, who has run away from home, and decide to shelter her without Rahul's consent.

programme.title: Hum Intezaar Karenge
programme.desc: Manisha, a wealthy woman, falls in love with Ajay, a middle-class man, who promises to marry her and settle down within three years. However, after the time period passes, he mysteriously disappears.

programme.title: Jeevan Dhaara
programme.desc: Sangeeta, a young woman, must sidetrack her dreams and work tirelessly to provide for her family after her father abandons them.

programme.title: Khuda Gawah
programme.desc: Baadshah Khan falls in love with Benazir, a member of a rival clan who has defeated him in a game of Buzkashi. Benazir will not marry him unless he brings back the head of her father's killer, Habibullah, from India.

programme.title: Mastana
programme.desc: A man befriends a neglected child from a wealthy family but her parents resent their friendship and stop her from seeing him. However, when she falls ill, only he can help her recover.

programme.title: Mohabbat 1985
programme.desc: When Shekhar falls for Roopa, he approaches her father with his parents. However, when his stepmother asks Roopa's father for dowry, he vows to marry his daughter elsewhere.

programme.title: Aanchal
programme.desc: The pure, selfless, and strong bond between Shambu and his sister-in-law Shanti is misunderstood by their family and the society, leading them to face many trials that threaten to split the family.

programme.title: Anupama
programme.desc: Uma, the only daughter of Mohan, grows up to be an introverted woman as her father despises her. She lands up in a great dilemma after she falls in love with Ashok, a poet.

programme.title: Apna Bana Lo
programme.desc: After losing his parents at a young age, Master is raised by a gangster who teaches him the tricks of his criminal trade. However, when Master adopts a child, he decides to give up on crime.

programme.title: Avtaar
programme.desc: Avtaar leads a happy life with his wife, Radha, and his sons, Chander and Ramesh. However, consumed by their greed and ambitions, Avtaar's sons betray him but he soon reaches new heights of success.

programme.title: Banphool
programme.desc: Haria and Gulabi, who are in love, plan to get married to each other, much to the chagrin of Ajay. However, things take a turn when Ajay plans to get Haria killed.

programme.title: Betaab
programme.desc: When Sunny meets his childhood friend Roma, cupid strikes. But Roma's father disapproves of their union and decides to separate them.

programme.title: Ek Chitthi Pyar Bhari
programme.desc: A doctor puts out a job posting to recruit a nurse for his clinics in rural India. Unaware of a candidate's dark past, he hires her and eventually falls in love with her.

programme.title: Shaadi Ke Patasey
programme.desc: Two people fall in love with each other but are unable to express their feelings. Things take a turn when their parents fix their wedding with other individuals.

programme.title: Shaadi Teri Bajayenge Hum Band
programme.desc: The story mainly builds on confusion and how that creates a huge humorous ruckus that will leave its audience in splits.

programme.title: Sharmaji Ki Lag Gayi
programme.desc: Professor Sharma, a prude man, writes columns for a weekly newspaper about issues related to sex. Things get chaotic in his life when his wife, Shobha, gets eve-teased by a criminal named Lallan.

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: An undercover agent receives a CD which contains the recording of his kidnapped wife, and is asked to kill the Prime Minister.

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Ever since he was 8 years of age, Kunal Mehra wanted to act in Bollywood movies much to his dad's displeasure. but has been not very successful in landing any major part in any movie.

programme.title: Tera Intezaar
programme.desc: A woman sets out to uncover how her lover went missing.

programme.title: Toh Baat Pakki
programme.desc: A pushy busybody invites a young man to be her tenant, in hopes of arranging a marriage for her younger sister; but then has to get rid off him when she believes she has found an even better match. With Tabu and Sharman Joshi. 2010.

programme.title: Traffic Signal
programme.desc: Silsila, a street smart young man, manages the various trades practised at a traffic signal in Mumbai. However, his world comes crashing down when he unknowingly aids in executing a murder.

programme.title: Uvaa
programme.desc: Worried about their future, five wayward teens from remote villages in UP are enrolled in an English medium school in Faridabad by their respective families in order to reform them. But can the youngsters adapt to their new posh surroundings?

programme.title: Veerey Ki Wedding
programme.desc: Veer and Geet fall in love with each other and want to get married. However, they face an obstacle after Geet's peace-loving father sees Veer getting involved in a fight to protect a girl.

programme.title: Barsaat 2005
programme.desc: Arav, an ambitious married man, travels to the US to seek better opportunities. There, Anna, whose grandfather offers Arav to work with him for automobile giants, falls in love with him.

programme.title: Aan Men At Work
programme.desc: DCP Patnaik has to encounter immorality and corruptions in the police forces he is serving and over come the mistrust of his colleagues.

programme.title: Ahista Ahista
programme.desc: For a fee of Rs.200/- Ankush Ramdev provides four witnesses to couples who come to register their marriages at the Registrar of Marriages in Dariyaganj, Delhi.

programme.title: SP Chauhan
programme.desc: Satpal Chauhan, a social worker from Haryana, works for women empowerment and also strives to create an alcohol-free society. However, while pursuing his goals, he faces several hardships.

programme.title: Shaadi Ke Patasey
programme.desc: Two people fall in love with each other but are unable to express their feelings. Things take a turn when their parents fix their wedding with other individuals.

programme.title: Shaadi Teri Bajayenge Hum Band
programme.desc: The story mainly builds on confusion and how that creates a huge humorous ruckus that will leave its audience in splits.

programme.title: Sharmaji Ki Lag Gayi
programme.desc: Professor Sharma, a prude man, writes columns for a weekly newspaper about issues related to sex. Things get chaotic in his life when his wife, Shobha, gets eve-teased by a criminal named Lallan.

programme.title: Speed
programme.desc: An undercover agent receives a CD which contains the recording of his kidnapped wife, and is asked to kill the Prime Minister.

programme.title: Superstar
programme.desc: Ever since he was 8 years of age, Kunal Mehra wanted to act in Bollywood movies much to his dad's displeasure. but has been not very successful in landing any major part in any movie.

programme.title: Tera Intezaar
programme.desc: A woman sets out to uncover how her lover went missing.
